data.text:
CLA Dean’s Scholarships & Awards

This application opens at the conclusion of the fall semester each year. Students with a primary major in the College of Liberal Arts may apply for CLA General Scholarships & Awards. Continuing students are encouraged to apply each year. Seniors who will be in their final semester when the application closes are also encouraged to apply. We suggest that students new to Temple University (freshman, transfers) apply each year once they have already completed one full semester at Temple University.

Please contact Yolanda Mobley at yolanda.mobley@temple.edu with questions regarding the CLA scholarships and awards.

ScholarshipUniverse

Study Abroad Scholarships & Awards

Study abroad scholarship and award recipients are selected by the S.A. committee during three separate cycles throughout the academic year: fall, spring and summer. Students eligible to apply for these awards have declared a major, minor, or certificate in the College of Liberal Arts and plan to study abroad in the semester for which they are applying. In addition to applying for funding through CLA, applicants must also apply and be accepted into their desired study abroad program through TU Education Abroad.

Please contact Yolanda Mobley at yolanda.mobley@temple.edu with questions.

The application cycles are as follows:

Summer Study Abroad - Application opens January 5 and closes February 15*

Fall Study Abroad - Application opens February 25 and closes April 1*

Spring Study Abroad - Application opens August 25 and closes October 1*

*Dates may change based on TU Education Abroad deadlines
